maml:description.maml:para: Adds a new module to the GitHub Gist List.
Adds a new module to the GitHub Gist List.
The File Name on GitHub Gist.
Name of the module to add. You can also use a keyword to search for.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: New-PWSHModuleList -ListName Base -Description "These modules needs to be installed on all servers" -GitHubUserID smitpi -GitHubToken $GitHubToken
